== Trivia ==
* The DLC was teased in a pop-up prompting the player to get the Superman skin pack, which released on July 8, 2025.
* Throughout the DLC, many subtle references to regular {{MC}} are made.
** Surrounding the Daily Planet globe are carvings of [[creepers]].
** Banners throughout Metropolis appear to show [[chickens]].
*The shot of Superman standing in front of the sun is a reference to the cover of the [https://dc.fandom.com/wiki/Superman_Vol_5_1 first issue] of Superman [https://dc.fandom.com/wiki/Superman_Vol_5 volume 5], which became a popular internet meme.
